attributes.action: Limit High ST Charity FundRaisers From taking bank details.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request to limit or ban ability of groups of Charity Fundraisers from pestering the public on the pavement with the intention of persuading them to sign up to making direct debit donations to the charity in question. The numbers of the fundraisers are growing and easily cooersed members of the public are being persuaded into commiting to making regular payments that had they been given time to consider properly they might not choose to do so. It is also annoying to be prevented from walking the High St unmolested.
